name: Don´t Get Any Closer
description:
Once upon a time, an evil horde arised and brought darkness to the world. 

They have arised again and you are the only one who can stop them from getting stronger.

How to play:

Use a gamepad or a keyboard.

Beat the enemies by pressing the same button on their head.

If you fail, you won't be able to cast spells for a while.

Get as many points as you can!

This is a project made for the 20 Second Game Jam - itch.io
